name: The First Age of Extreme
description:
The First Age of Extreme is a heroic Amiga inspired 2D platformer made by Atte Okkonen for Wizard Jam 2016.

Controls:

Fullscreen: F on keyboard, Select button on controller

Run: A/D on keyboard, Left/Right on controller dpad

Jump: Right Shift or Space on keyboard, A button on controller

Spectral Blade: Enter or M on keyboard, X button on controller (holding up or down will change the angle)

To title / Quit from title: Esc on keyboard, Start button on controller

ProHUD: E on keyboard, Y button on controller

Run timer: Q on keyboard, B button on controller
